name: Protein Vegetable Omelette
description: Egg white-heavy omelette packed with vegetables. Low calorie, high protein breakfast.

instructions.instruction: Whisk egg whites and whole egg in a bowl.
Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Saut√© mushrooms and peppers for 2 minutes.
Pour egg mixture into the pan, spread evenly.
As edges set, pull them in with spatula to let uncooked egg flow to edges.
instructions.tip: Let raw egg flow to the sides.

instructions.instruction: Place vegetables, tomato, and cheese on one half.
Fold the other half over. Cook 1 more minute.
Garnish with green onion and serve.

tips: Egg whites are pure protein with no fat.
Adding 1 whole egg provides omega-3 and choline.
Vegetables can be varied - try zucchini or broccoli.
storageInfo: Best served fresh. Cannot be made ahead.
servingSuggestion: Serve with whole wheat toast or fresh fruit.
variations: Different cheeses can be used - cottage cheese, mozzarella.
Meat lovers can add turkey ham.
